description: Try our easy to follow Gluten-Free Waldorf Quinoa Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Waldorf salad,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Apple,Peanut free
name: Gluten-Free Waldorf Quinoa Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Pink Lady apple, halved, cored (thinly sliced)
0.75 cup Jalna gluten-free whole milk lactose free yoghurt

recipeInstructions.text: Cook gluten-free quinoa according to packet directions. Cool completely.
To make the dressing, combine all ingredients in a small bowl and season.

Place quinoa in a large serving bowl. Add pecans, apple, celery, fennel and lettuce leaves. Add half the dressing, tossing to combine. Drizzle with remaining dressing, then divide among four plates and serve.
